definition: How are you getting by?/How's life?/contraction of 過得去|过得去, can get by/tolerably well/not too bad
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
lit. can pass through (an opening)/fig. can get by (in life)/tolerably well/not too bad/How are you getting by?/How's life?

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天过得很棒，但我在水里把自己给晒伤了。

sentences.english: How time fast! The sun set. It is time to come back.
sentences.chinese: 时间过得真快呀，太阳下山了，我们也该回去了。

sentences.english: How are you at the Grange?
Though having no money, he a happy life.
sentences.chinese: 虽然没有钱，他仍然过得狠快乐。

sentences.english: His future was uncertain, but he did not believe it could be unhappier than his past.
sentences.chinese: 他对将来仍一片迷茫，但他相信会比过去过得开心。

sentences.english: If works voluntary worker, the life crosses looks like the slave.
sentences.chinese: 若工作成义工的话，一生过得像奴隶。

sentences.english: May you lead happy life in your golden times in your life.
sentences.chinese: 希望你能在你性命中这段黄金光阴里面过得快乐。

sentences.english: Summer vacation was not fruitful, but also have a white cross.
sentences.chinese: 暑假过得不敢说收获颇丰，倒也未尝白过。

sentences.english: The old man spent his old age in contentment.
sentences.chinese: 那位老人晚年过得很称心。

sentences.english: make your life run a lot easier.
sentences.chinese: 使你的生活过得更顺利。

sentences.english: How are you getting along these days? I miss you very much.
sentences.chinese: 你近来过得如何？我十分想念你。

sentences.english: Mr. Preston lived well with his construction money.
sentences.chinese: 凭着做建筑工挣的钱，普雷斯顿过得很好。

sentences.english: Muscat can do luxury if you want it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢的话可以在马斯喀特过得很奢侈。

sentences.english: Classes can be beguiled with interesting stories.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的故事使上课时间过得很快。

sentences.english: Iff you fade from my memory, I think I would be very well.
sentences.chinese: 如果你从我的记忆中淡去，我想，我会过得很好。

definition: to pass/to spend (time)/to survive/to get through
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
tight (i.e. lacking money)/hard up/same as 緊巴巴|紧巴巴
to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
